title: Programming Lead for Psychological Horror Game

hiringOrganization.name: Dark Nyx Studio
hiringOrganization.description: An indie game development team working on 'Jizo no Akumu', a psychological horror game inspired by Japanese folklore, focusing on trauma, memory, and identity.

description: Dark Nyx Studio is seeking a Programming Lead for our upcoming game 'Jizo no Akumu'. In this role, you'll oversee the programming aspects, ensuring smooth functionality and gameplay. Position is revshare only until the game releases commercially.
responsibilities: Lead the programming team in developing gameplay mechanics
Collaborate with artists and designers to implement game features
Ensure high-quality code and effective problem-solving
qualifications: Experience in Unreal Engine is required
Ability to work collaboratively in a remote team environment
Excellent communication skills, especially via Discord

value.unitText: Percentage of profits after game release
